verses.text: So when David was old and full of days , he made Solomon his son king over Israel. \p
¶ And he gathered together all the princes of Israel , with the priests and the Levites.
Now the Levites were numbered from the age of thirty years and upward : and their number by their polls , man by man , was thirty and eight thousand.

Of which , twenty and four thousand \add were\add* to set forward the work of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and six thousand \add were\add* officers and judges :\f + \fr 23.4 \ft set…: or, oversee\f*

Moreover four thousand \add were\add* porters ; and four thousand praised the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with the instruments which I made , \add said David\add*, to praise \add therewith\add*.
And David divided them into courses among the sons of Levi , \add namely\add*, Gershon , Kohath , and Merari.\f + \fr 23.6 \ft courses: Heb. divisions\f* \p
¶ Of the Gershonites \add were\add*, Laadan , and Shimei.\f + \fr 23.7 \ft Laadan: or, Libni\f*
The sons of Laadan ; the chief \add was\add* Jehiel , and Zetham , and Joel , three.
The sons of Shimei ; Shelomith , and Haziel , and Haran , three. These \add were\add* the chief of the fathers of Laadan.
And the sons of Shimei \add were\add*, Jahath , Zina , and Jeush , and Beriah. These four \add were\add* the sons of Shimei.\f + \fr 23.10 \ft Zina: or, Zizah\f*

And Jahath was the chief , and Zizah the second : but Jeush and Beriah had not many sons ; therefore they were in one reckoning , according to \add their\add* father’s house.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft had…: Heb. did not multiply sons\f* \p
¶ The sons of Kohath ; Amram , Izhar , Hebron , and Uzziel , four.

The sons of Amram ; Aaron and Moses : and Aaron was separated , that he should sanctify the most holy things , he and his sons for ever , to burn incense before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to minister unto him, and to bless in his name for ever.
Now \add concerning\add* Moses the man of God , his sons were named of the tribe of Levi.
The sons of Moses \add were\add*, Gershom , and Eliezer.
Of the sons of Gershom , Shebuel \add was\add* the chief.\f + \fr 23.16 \ft Shebuel: also called, Shubael\f*

And the sons of Eliezer \add were\add*, Rehabiah the chief. And Eliezer had none other sons ; but the sons of Rehabiah were very many.\f + \fr 23.17 \ft the chief: or, the first\f*\f + \fr 23.17 \ft very many: Heb. highly multiplied\f*
Of the sons of Izhar ; Shelomith the chief.\f + \fr 23.18 \ft Shelomith: also called, Shelomoth\f*
Of the sons of Hebron ; Jeriah the first , Amariah the second , Jahaziel the third , and Jekameam the fourth.
Of the sons of Uzziel ; Michah the first , and Jesiah the second. \p
¶ The sons of Merari ; Mahli , and Mushi. The sons of Mahli ; Eleazar , and Kish.
And Eleazar died , and had no sons , but daughters : and their brethren the sons of Kish took them.\f + \fr 23.22 \ft brethren: or, kinsmen\f*
The sons of Mushi ; Mahli , and Eder , and Jeremoth , three. \p

¶ These \add were\add* the sons of Levi after the house of their fathers ; \add even\add* the chief of the fathers , as they were counted by number of names by their polls , that did the work for the service of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, from the age of twenty years and upward.

For David said , The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel hath given rest unto his people , that they may dwell in Jerusalem for ever :\f + \fr 23.25 \ft that…: or, and he dwelleth in Jerusalem, etc\f*
And also unto the Levites ; they shall no \add more\add* carry the tabernacle , nor any vessels of it for the service thereof.
For by the last words of David the Levites \add were\add* numbered from twenty years old and above :\f + \fr 23.27 \ft numbered: Heb. number\f*

Because their office \add was\add* to wait on the sons of Aaron for the service of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in the courts , and in the chambers , and in the purifying of all holy things , and the work of the service of the house of God ;\f + \fr 23.28 \ft their…: Heb. their station was at the hand of the sons of Aaron\f*

Both for the shewbread , and for the fine flour for meat offering , and for the unleavened cakes , and for \add that which is baked in\add* the pan , and for that which is fried , and for all manner of measure and size ;\f + \fr 23.29 \ft pan: or, flat plate\f*
And to stand every morning to thank and praise the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and likewise at even ;

And to offer all burnt sacrifices unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the sabbaths , in the new moons , and on the set feasts , by number , according to the order commanded unto them, continually before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*:

And that they should keep the charge of the tabernacle of the congregation , and the charge of the holy \add place\add*, and the charge of the sons of Aaron their brethren , in the service of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
